alert.note: Alert for Clark; Madison (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 6:50PM EDT until July 24 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Clark County in west central Ohio... West central Madison County in central Ohio... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 649 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near South Charleston, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... London, Brighton, South Vienna, Plattsburg and Interstate 70 at State Route 56. This includes I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 66 and 75. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
